title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours       Ranger led programs are available year round. All tours and programs are free and open to the public. For more information or to RSVP for a program, please e-mail us or call (703) 255-1827.  Â      There are 104 rope fly lines in the Filene Center. Come see them for yourself. NPS Photo  Backstage Tours: Stand on a world-class stage, learn how a theater runs, and get a sneak peek at where the stars get ready. Backstage tours are available from October - April. Tours are limited to 30 participants. Tours will be held at 2 pm unless otherwise noted. January 10 January 24 February 7  February 21 March 6 March 20 April 10 April 24 Contact us to schedule additional tours for interested groups. Learn about Summer Ranger Programs for kids.
